Text: I'm not sure where I got it, but I have the gold edition english version (it's bigger at 791 MB).  I am running Windows 7 x64 and for all you people that are having color problems, try running it inside a fantastic little program called D3DWindower.  You can view a tutorial on how to use that program on youtube.
It works fine, but it's in dutch, without any language settings.

If your 1602 game is crashing (when encountering pirates or during other battles), turn off the in game audio and play the music out of game in winamp or whatever program. This completely fixes the battle-related crashes.
